title: Visit DePaul - Graduate Students | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Graduate Visits Graduate Visits Here are the ways you can experience DePaul Grad school is an investment—one that can propel your career. Each college and school at DePaul has tailored visit opportunities designed to: Highlight its programs, philosophy and approach to education Answer your questions Connect you with counselors, faculty and staff Register for an Upcoming Event Choose the graduate school event you’d like to attend:
